question: Which district of Manipur has been declared as the first Open Defecation Free (ODF) district of the state?
explanation: Senapati district of Manipur has been declared as the first Open Defecation Free (ODF) district of the state. Manipur has become the third state in the North East, after Sikkim and Arunachal Pradesh, to get the ODF tag. Till 27th March, Manipur was among the only three states not to have a single ODF district, the other two being Bihar and Goa.
